patthana18.12:1.1: Hetuñceva sahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.12:2.1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
